sentences.english: It was the volunteer emergency crew on the other end.
Children of the rescue work continued, suddenly heard "help" the voice shouted.
sentences.chinese: 子弟們繼續着救援工作，突然聽到“救命”的呼喊聲。

sentences.english: And the much-awaited announcement of the bank rescue plan left everyone confused rather than reassured.
sentences.chinese: 而期待已久的銀行救援計劃讓衆人疑惑而非放心。

sentences.english: Rescuers worked after daybreak to try to reach those trapped in the rubble of collapsed buildings.
sentences.chinese: 救援人員拂曉開始搜尋被埋在倒坍建築物瓦礫中的人。

sentences.english: The operation of the large ARFF unit was improper.
sentences.chinese: 大型飛機救援消防單位的操作並不適當。

sentences.english: Workers built shelters for survivors whose homes had been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 救援人員爲那些家園被毀的倖存者蓋起了避難所。

sentences.english: Recent news about Israel flotilla raid, things are complicated.
sentences.chinese: 最近關於以色列襲擊救援船的新聞，事情是複雜的。

sentences.english: European leaders have yet to agree on the size and conditions of a rescue fund, or plan.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲領導人還同意一個救援基金或計劃的規模和條件。

sentences.english: What VH1 is doing with their Save the Music campaign is phenomenal .
sentences.chinese: VH1正在以他們的救援做音樂活動的是顯著的。

sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援隊週日在北川中學挖掘出10具屍體。

sentences.english: Rescue workers search for missing people among the debris in Gojo, Nara Prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 在奈良縣五條，救援人員在殘骸中尋找失蹤人員。

sentences.english: ETA of rescue ship at distress position is 1930 utc.
sentences.chinese: 救援船預計在1930utc到達事故地點。

sentences.english: The rest of the rescue team are of course much earlier. Snowmobiles are fast!
sentences.chinese: 其餘救援隊員還使用速度更快的雪地摩托。

sentences.english: Ships were ordered back to port and relief workers reinforced coastal defenses.
sentences.chinese: 船隻已被命令回港，同時救援人員也在加強沿海防洪。

sentences.english: A team of snipers has been dispatched to save those trapped.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一隊狙擊手已被派往被困地，隨時展開救援。

sentences.english: Speak to Matisse and Cleopatra comes to your rescue.
sentences.chinese: 發言馬蒂斯和克婁巴特拉來到你的救援。

definition: to come to the aid of/to save/to rescue from danger/to relieve
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
to rescue/to help out of difficulties/to save the situation
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
